Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<FONT_SIZE_L>HURRY, HURRY!!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ah! <MYNAME>! We have a huge problem!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It sounds like my brother has been seriously
injured!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We're on our way to the clinic right now. AH!
And we've gotta hurry!
Good luck!
(Follow them.)
(See them off.)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Goodness. What is all this fuss?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, thank goodness! You look well for someone
who was terribly injured. Fritz came running to
get me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_INCOMPREHENSIBLE_R>Huh? Wait, you can walk? Are you sure you
should be doing that?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>Of course I can walk. I just tripped, that's all!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Huh? But...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness, did you really believe all that? No one
is seriously going to break a leg missing a step
or two down the staircase, darling.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>R-really?!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Sheesh. Must you make a fuss over everything?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Though doctor, I don't think it's appropriate for
someone in your position to exaggerate the
condition of a patient.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I hardly thought he would actually believe
me!
<PAGE>
And I did follow it up right away by saying I was
kidding, but he had already dashed off before the
words even left my mouth.
<PAGE>
Still, you're right. I'm very sorry, honey.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
And you were dragged into this, too?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I assure you, I'm quite all right.
<PAGE>
I tripped and twisted my ankle, is all. But it
seems these two decided to make it sound
worse. They found that amusing, I suppose!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to have made you worry. I'm sure you
must've been rather put out.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? I mean that precisely as I said it. Isn't
worrying over someone else an unwanted
interruption to your day?
<PAGE>
I'm pretty sure it would be for me, at least.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME> has the right idea, Mistel.
<PAGE>
I could never just stand there, knowing you were
hurt, worrying over how bad it might be...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But now that we know you're all right, there isn't
one single thing I feel "put out" about!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I see. So that's how it is, then?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Of course! Now, then, I'll be going back home, if
there's nothing else...
<PAGE>
I left in such a hurry I didn't even have a chance
to lock the door!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm really sorry.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, I've got to head back as well. There's
still work to be done! Take care of yourself.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I ought to get back to work myself.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, if you don't mind, could you walk
Mistel home? Just in case. Thanks, honey!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can walk perfectly fine. There's no need for
anyone to walk me all the way home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Ah-aaah! ♪ I said just in case. That's doctor's
orders, so you have to obey. Doctors even
override captains, you know!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Take care, now, both of you. Ta-tah!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, guess that's that, then. I'm sorry, but
would you please accompany me?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee.
...Oh! Sorry.
<PAGE>
I was just thinking of the expression on your
face, and I couldn't help but laugh.
<PAGE>
It was only a little sprain, but you dashed in
looking so terrified, one might think the world
was ending!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...I know, I know, it's not a laughing matter. You
were genuinely worried about me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be honest, I still can't understand why you
aren't bothered having to worry about someone
else like that. It would rile me up for sure!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I guess...it isn't so bad to have someone
desperately wishing for my safety. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we be going, then?

I later discovered that Fritz had blown the whole
thing out of proportion. Mistel had only twisted
his ankle. But thank goodness he's okay!
